entries.meaning: (India) The large spiral shell of several species of sea conch, much used in making bangles, especially Turbinella pyrum.

description: Expressive verb akin to champ, chomp; probably alteration of champ.

verbs.description: chank (third-person singular simple present chanks, present participle chanking, simple past and past participle chanked)

entries.meaning: (US) To eat noisily; to champ or chomp.
